title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Gig Harbor, WA)
Interview Descriptions: Quick interview process, I have applied and was scheduled on the next day for an interview. Initially , they just ask a brief background of your experiences and your reason why you apply for a certain position The process is smooth.
Interview Questions: Give an instance that the patient is not satisfied about your care and what did you do?

title: Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Started with submitting my resume, a phone interview, then an in-person interview. After the interview , my interviewer told me about an upcoming skills test. After the skills test they make an offer

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Gig Harbor, WA) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interviewer asked 10-15 behavioral questions over a zoom call that lasted 40 minutes. Afterwards we discussed what a normal day would be like on the unit and the types of patients that are common. Relatively casual setting and she joked around with me.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you disagree with a provider's order.

title: Assistant Nurse Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview which included the manager, director, ANM, and staff. They used standardized questions and they provided an opportunity to ask my own questions at the end.
Interview Questions: Can you describe what professionalism is?

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital
Interview Descriptions: was not too difficult, was asked general interview questions like where I see myself in 3-5 years  and what experience I have had in the past and was also asked about scheduling preference
Interview Questions: where do you see yourself in 3-5 years?

title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Was a very good process! Manager was super kind, and gave a walk around the unit . Felt very at ease, and welcomed . It was a one on one interview at the time do to the unit being small .

title: Surgery RN I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Registered online, applied to position, received a call back within 2-3 weeks, attended initial interview in May, followed up with director, received a second interview with scheduler/supervisor, received a call within that week with a job offer, accepted offer and received start dates available.
Interview Questions: Why am I interested in the position?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed in a relaxing atmosphere and we both spoke our minds and discussed how I can help bring the patients to a more comfortable and convient setting and show them that we at St Anthonys want our patients to feel number 1

title: Patient Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Shawnee, OK) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was friendly and informative. They made you feel completely comfortable. They gave you the chance to see if the job would fit you. They questions where straight to the point for the job you would be doing. They also prepared you for if they made an offer the kinda of shifts and hours you would be working.
Interview Questions: what was one example of my compassion toward a patient, person, or customer.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Conducted and interview with the off going and on coming nurse manager and then had a peer interview.  I loved the opportunity to have a peer interview to ask questions specific to the unit.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital
Interview Descriptions: I applied online through Indeed and heard back 2 weeks later. I was preinterviewed by a recruiter and the questions were straightforward. It was about my experience, nursing education, etc.
Interview Questions: How will this position help you in the future?

title: Mental Health Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Oklahoma City, OK) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Went Good very professional. They ask me where would I be in 5 years. They were very Respectful. I told them I'm a team player, Respectful, on time, and very compassionate.

title: Nurse Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Shawnee, OK) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: First a phone call interview then a in person interview then they brought me in for a peer to peer interview. It was intensive!  It was hard to get to the interviewer due to not knowing where her office was but found it on time
Interview Questions: How will you balance work and school

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Submitted application Sunday night, contacted by secretary of DON on Monday. An interview scheduled for later in week. Contacted the day after interview to set up phone interview on the following Monday.

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Denver, CO) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed. They need more staff. Awesome manager at the time. I was interviewed by two floors and they called me as soon as I got home to give me an offer. I should have asked for more money at the time because of this. If you don't have any experience put in clinicals as if they were employers to get through the computer screening process. The floors are desperate to hire more people but the canidates have to go through a recruiter first and They will only call you if you meet the written requirements. They hire on a rolling basis so you may not hear from the recruiter for a while depending on when you apply. First an email is received then a scheduled phone interview to talk about qualifications then an interview with a manager.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you reacted well in a difficult situation.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Lakewood, CO) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward. I interviewed with the manager and 2 peers. They asked behavioral questions, no clinical questions. They were friendly and valued my previous experience. They had enough of a need for nurses that I could start directly on days.
Interview Questions: name a time you had to deal with a difference of opinion with a doctor.

title: Nutrition Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital (Gig Harbor, WA) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions: First you will individually interview with an upper management person and then you come back for a team interview where they take about 6 people from the department you are going to work in to ask you questions about everything. They want to make sure they are a good fit for you too. You will also be drug tested and they test for nicotine too now.
Interview Questions: How do your own core values correlate with Franciscans values?

title: Staffer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at St. Anthony's Hospital in Jul 2010
Interview Descriptions: Long time ago, don't remember much.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you didn't have enough people to fill the requirements?
